references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing the FedAvg algorithm which is a key component of many personalized federated learning approaches.

references.paper_title: Advances and open problems in federated learning
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of federated learning, including discussions of non-i.i.d. data, personalization techniques, and open challenges in the field.

references.paper_title: Exploiting shared representations for personalized federated learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the idea of decomposing federated learning into shared representation learning and personalized classifier training, a technique that is directly relevant to the proposed pFedFDA algorithm.
This work addresses the challenges of federated learning in non-i.i.d. settings, providing a theoretical analysis and proposing solutions for improved model convergence and accuracy.
This paper is highly cited, proposing a personalized federated learning method with adaptive client selection and model aggregation techniques which are directly compared with in the current work.
